column18: symptomC_The smoke comes out during startup and then stops
column19: symptomC_The smoke comes out of the exhaust when starting and then stops
column20: symptomC_The smoke comes out of the exhaust while driving

column26: The cooling system is clogged - it needs to be cleaned
The alternator belt may be slipping or the fan clutch may be damaged
Check if the air filter is clean. If so then check the fuel injection sensor
The engine sensor may be faulty
A new head gasket may be needed
The engine sensor may be damaged
Matching problem between the brake pads and the front discs
Check for a vacuum leak or moisture in the distributor cap (distributor)
Check the balance of the four wheels
Matching problem between the brake pads and the front discs
This is a normal situation. The anti lock system pulsates the brakes
